title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 179-4.4 - Enforcement of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 179-4.4 - Enforcement of rules

State Regulations

It is the responsibility of every facility or program
employee to immediately and consistently enforce all level I, II and III rules
for all residents. Any violation of these rules must be addressed immediately
by the staff observing the incident. Any disciplinary action must be
documented. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
179-4.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
